text:
Amazing place, amazing views of Downtown Montréal and beyond, amazing atmosphere, amazing staff!

The only thing I don't like about this observation deck is that you cannot go downstairs to eat/shop at the mall and then comeback upstairs to keep enjoying the view. The ticket price is a kind of expensive for not offering the in & out option.

Super rooftop au sommet de la Place Ville Marie, sur lequel vous pouvez prendre un verre en contemplant la ville d'en haut. Il y a de la bière (blonde, blanche, IPA) et du vin surtout.
Environ 8$ pour une pinte de bière.
Il y a quelques tables et chaises, sinon certains restent debout pour mieux admirer..
De l'autre coté, au même étage, il y a le restaurant les Enfants terribles, fermé lui, qui prend des réservations depuis peu (laisser un message sur le répondeur).
Pour l'observatoire tout en haut, il faut se renseigner avant si possible car il est parfois fermé pour événement privé.
A essayer vite vite avant l'arrivée de l'hiver! ;)

This observatory is included in the montreal city pass.

Not a long wait, and not many people, so was a nice ride up to the 46th floor looking down at the city of montreal through glass windows on all sides of the building. They have information of the landmarks at each corner. 

They also had plugs and benches to charge our phones if needed to.

The doors and walls are all painted with the same design so it's easy to miss the elevator on the first floor or bathrooms on the 46th floor.

There are two friendly people walking in the 46th floor if you need assistance.

It would be more awesome if they were open at night also.  They close at 5pm, so we could only view the city in daylight.

The atmosphere is great and the views are even better! I had already eaten dinner, so I went to just grab a drink with friends and dessert. I got the Moscow Mule and Vanilla Icecream and it was spectacular! But I would read this review with a grain of salt because I do not like the taste of alcohol and you couldn't really taste it in the moscow mule. The vanilla ice cream came with a soaked hot cake type thing and I guess it was okay. Def worth checking out!

Si vous aimez vraiment les vues en hauteur ca vaut la peine de payer 20$ pour aller s'extasier pleine la vue de Montreal à cet observatoire nouvellement renové. L'expo sur les magnifiques endroits à visiter à Mtl est pour les touristes, aucune surprise pour un vrai Montrealais. Resto sur place et aussi terrasse pour un drink.
